scripts.generate:api: bun run generate:datakatalog && bun run generate:uberiket && bun run generate:cleanup
scripts.generate:datakatalog: bunx openapi-generator-cli generate -i specs/datakatalog.json -g typescript-axios -o src/api/generated/datakatalog --global-property=models,apis,supportingFiles=index.ts:base.ts:common.ts:configuration.ts --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,modelPackage=models,apiPackage=api
scripts.generate:uberiket: bunx openapi-generator-cli generate -i specs/uberiket.json -g typescript-axios -o src/api/generated/uberiket --global-property=models,apis,supportingFiles=index.ts:base.ts:common.ts:configuration.ts --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,modelPackage=models,apiPackage=api
scripts.generate:cleanup: rm -rf src/api/generated/*/docs src/api/generated/*/.openapi-generator src/api/generated/*/.gitignore src/api/generated/*/.npmignore src/api/generated/*/git_push.sh src/api/generated/*/.openapi-generator-ignore
